object.name: PassportElementErrorReverseSide
object.description: Represents an issue with the reverse side of a document. The error is considered resolved when the file with reverse side of the document changes.
object.html_description: Represents an issue with the reverse side of a document. The error is considered resolved when the file with reverse side of the document changes.
object.rst_description: Represents an issue with the reverse side of a document. The error is considered resolved when the file with reverse side of the document changes.

annotations.description: The section of the user's Telegram Passport which has the issue, one of 'driver_license', 'identity_card'
annotations.html_description: The section of the user's Telegram Passport which has the issue, one of “driver_license”, “identity_card”
annotations.rst_description: The section of the user's Telegram Passport which has the issue, one of 'driver_license', 'identity_card'

annotations.description: Base64-encoded hash of the file with the reverse side of the document
